ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 110
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/12/99 10:06:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time, DBellassai@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/12/99 10:06:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
DBellassai@... writes:

<< PLEASE DONT EMAIL BULLSHIT ..................UNLESS YOU HAVE FACTS THEN
EMAIL
IT...... IF YOU DONT HAVE ANY FACTS THEN SHUT THE HELL UP >>

Does someone have an attitude here? As far as I know this is a mailing
list to discuss issues about tinkering. Never did I read in the discription
of this list that "ONLY FACTS" should be discussed. It takes many ideas ..
some will prove to be helpfull and some will not. Get off this facts only
kick of yours and try having some fun with it. That whole "search beneath the
waves" thing turned out to be nothing but it sure was fun !

Gazu
